pageContent: Objective: To present a summary of the 2016 version of the European Association of Urology (EAU) - European Society for Radiotherapy & Oncology (ESTRO) - International Society of Geriatric Oncology (SIOG) Guidelines on the treatment of relapsing, metastatic, and castration-resistant prostate cancer (CRPC).

metaData.source:
[HIFU in salvage treatment of patients with prostate cancer after primary external radiation therapy--status 2012]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22875633/
